caption.p: Histopathological micrograph of the liver in APAP-treated mice.

(a) Control; (b) APAP; (c) silymarin 200 mg/kg/day + APAP; (d) silymarin 200 mg/kg/day; (e) GMSYS 700 mg/kg/day + APAP; (f) GMSYS 1400 mg/kg/day + APAP; (g) GMSYS 1400 mg/kg/day. The liver sections were stained with H&E (Ã— 40).
